page.title: 21Colchester United F.C. In 2011
page.content:
Colchester United F.C is a football club based in Colchester. They currently play in Football League One.

From 1937-2008 their home ground was Layer Road Stadium. The last game at layer road was a 1-0 defeat to Stoke City held on 26th April 2008. It was locked for the last time on 17th July 2008. Despite plans for the stadium's demolition, it currently remains standing.

Their current stadium is Colchester Community Stadium (Currently called Weston Homes Community Stadium due to the club's sponsorship). It was built on Cuckoo Farm, less than a quarter of a mile from the A12. The stadium's record attendence is 10,084 - Norwich City V Colchester (10/01/2010).

The club is currently managed by John Ward and Captained by Kemal Izzet.


Jonathan Baldwin
